channel.title: Problem running clients on my computer
channel.description: Okay, so I will get straight to buisness, I run a client, it starts up correctly, I log on to a server, move around in the server, and about 10 seconds later the client (and all clients I run for that matter; including galkon) just randomly close. After this it says "click anywhere to continue" in the command prompt. I did not edit or mess with the clients files in [b]ANY WAY.[/b] If it helps I have a Windows Vista, all help is appreciated. Please help me, I really want to get this fixed. I HAVE the JDK required, and the JRE.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2009, 04:02:39 pm[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP..

item.title: Problem running clients on my computer
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Your most likely on Windows Vista 64bit. Idk why this happens it happens on some and some they work. This is also just 317s. Idk a fix for it I was looking for one a week ago or so. Also some clients have a “Run 84” and that works on vista 64bit so maybe you could ask around about that.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem running clients on my computer

item.title: Problem running clients on my computer
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Okay, so I will get straight to buisness, I run a client, it starts up correctly, I log on to a server, move around in the server, and about 10 seconds later the client (and all clients I run for that matter; including galkon) just randomly close. After this it says “click anywhere to continue” in the command prompt. I did not edit or mess with the clients files in ANY WAY. If it helps I have a Windows Vista, all help is appreciated. Please help me, I really want to get this fixed. I HAVE the JDK required, and the JRE.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2009, 04:02:39 pm[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP…
